TEXT.TITLE: HOG AND CATTLE SLAUGHTER GUESSTIMATES
TEXT.BODY: Chicago Mercantile Exchange floor traders and commission house representatives are guesstimating today's hog slaughter at about 260,000 to 265,000 head, versus 259,000 a week ago and 262,000 a year ago. Cattle slaughter is guesstimated in the 127,000 to 130,000 head range, versus 125,000 week ago and 138,000 a year ago. Reuter
